dsOverview.title: ECMWF TOGA 2.5 degree Global Surface and Upper Air Analyses

summary.p: This dataset contains 2.5 degree latitude-longitude output grids from the ECMWF operational model. Both upper air and surface grids are archived in this dataset.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: ECMWF > European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

access.p: Must be a registered user of RDA ECMWF Data (Other Than Operational Data). Please update your current RDA user profile by clicking on the "ECMWF Data (Other Than Operational Data)" terms of acceptance, or create a new RDA user profile if you have not already done so (and click on the "ECMWF Data (Other Than Operational Data)" terms of acceptance during the registration process).

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Water Vapor > Humidity

reference.title: Global Analyses from ECMWF and Atlas of 1000 to 10 mb Circulation Statistics
